title: Dark and Darker Class Tier List
description: Discover the strengths and weaknesses of each class in Dark and Darker and choose the one that best suits your playstyle. This tier list includes S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier rankings for solo and group play.
heading: Dark and Darker Class Tier List
introText: Discover the strengths and weaknesses of each class in Dark and Darker and choose the one that best suits your playstyle. This tier list includes S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier rankings for solo and group play.

data.itemDescription: Clerics are incredibly powerful healers and can also buff their allies with holy magic, making them invaluable in both solo and group play
Wizards are glass cannons but deal massive damage with their spells. They also have utility spells like Haste, Invisibility, and Ignite
Fighters are well-rounded and have good damage output, survivability, and crowd control. They are a great choice for beginners and experienced players alike
Rogues are stealthy and can deal decent damage with sneak attacks. They are also good at scouting and disarming traps
Barbarians are very durable and deal good damage in close combat. However, they lack mobility and range
Warlocks are versatile and can deal damage, heal, and crowd control. However, they are not as strong as other classes in any one area
